price: Yet those who were given the Scripture did not disagree[3] except after the clear proof came to them,
arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
